head.description: A robot head with an unusually large eye and teloscpic neck -- excellent for exploring high spaces.
head.title: Large Cyclops

leftArm.description: An articulated arm with a claw -- great for reaching around corners or working in tight spaces.
leftArm.title: Articulated

rightArm.description: An articulated arm with a claw -- great for reaching around corners or working in tight spaces.
rightArm.title: Articulated

torso.description: A torso that can bend slightly at the waist and equiped with a heat guage.
torso.title: Flexible Gauged

base.description: A two wheeled base with an accelerometer for stability.
base.title: Double Wheeled

head.title: Friendly
